WorkItem.Description: Upon starting RAWR the window to switch to beta always pops up. Was a problem in .13 and .14 and was supposed to be resolved in .15. All I want is to not see the window about updating to the beta. I appreciate all the hard work you guys are doing but I'm not interested in the beta at this point and time and wish just to use .15 w/o the added nag window to update to 3.0 every time I use the program. Any info would be appreciated. <3
WorkItem.Summary: Suppress beta window on every launch

Comments.Message:
already fixed



** Closed by Jothay 4/23/2010 9:27 PM

I don't mean you any disrespect, but I don't know why you say it's fixed, as it's not on my machine. I just formatted my machine (not related to Rawr) and re-downloaded 2.3.15 and it still has the "A message from the Rawr development team" popup every time I load the program. Is it a fix I need to download?

It IS fixed in the source code (commit 49731), but no release was done since the fix.
It will be fixed in 2.3.16 (or whatever comes after 2.3.15).
